import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "wouter"; import { BiHomeAlt } from "react-icons/bi"; import { BsTrash } from "react-icons/bs"; const NavbarNotes = () => { useEffect(() => { const savedTasks = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("notes")); const delNotes = savedTasks.filter((task) => task.deleted); const NumberDelNotes = delNotes.lenght; }, []); return (
Sticky Notes

  • {NumberDelNotes}

); }; export default NavbarNotes;
